name: The Lakeview Resort Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were good for the price. There was no restaurant, but they had a great continental breakfast with plenty of options. The staff were extremely friendly. I would stay there again as it is very reasonably priced.
reviews.title: good Place for the money

reviews.text: Recently visited Waskesiu for a Bachelorette Getaway, and was quite disgusted with how we were treated. Our rooms were not cleaned properly (they just came in and made the beds - didn't clean garbage, change our flickering bathroom light that we left on purposely, etc). We also had a 'noise complaint' at 9pm, when it is posted EVERYWHERE that quiet time is from 11pm to 7am - and, believe it or not, we were only talking in our room as to what our evening will look like (not even blaring music, running up and down hallways, etc. like some hotels). FALSE ADVERTISING for their 'hospitality room' - it is in fact not available for ANYONE to use!! Would NOT stay here again!!!
reviews.title: Very Unaccomodating!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and i went up for july 8 for a mini vacation we had a room on main floor with lakeview u dont see alot of lake because of tall trees but still nice to look out . the rooms were very comfortable and the staff esp Therin and Hanna provided exceptional cust service. the continental breakfast was well socked and clean. would definitly go back price is right also
reviews.title: Cozy great location

reviews.text: Our young family recently stayed at the Lakeview in their recently renovated room! Very cozy! It had all we need to enjoy a good nights sleep after a busy day on the trails and the beach. The staff was very polite and accommodated requests to make our stay better! We liked the location as it is close to the town centre but not too close to all the action. On the balcony while enjoying the free continental breakfast to the left you're looking into the forest and lake, not other properties which is nice! We enjoyed our stay!
reviews.title: Cozy stay for active family!

reviews.text: Seven friends and myself went to Waskesiu to golf. We stayed at the Lakeview because of the competitive pricing but were really impressed with the staff and their willingness to make our stay enjoyable. We enjoyed the continental breakfast before golfing and the deck which overlooks the beautiful Waskesiu lake after we had completed eighteen holes. The rooms were adequate and looked to have been renovated recently and the whole hotel was spotless.
reviews.title: Location Location Location

aka: The Lakeview Resort Hotel Waskesiu, Saskatchewan
description: The Lakeview Hotel is located in the heart of Prince Albert National park, surrounded by pristine lakes and boreal forest. We offer spacious modern, comfortable rooms in conjunction with unique services to fulfill your holiday expectations. Hotel guests enjoy our complimentary continental breakfast.
